body:
Hi Community



I have a strange problem regarding interior surfaces when I run energy simulation via Openstudio .. 



I modeled an atrium which has adjacency with multiple zones and when I add interior windows between adjacent surfaces I get errors like in the picture attached below. 

In unmethours.com I could understand as the atrium is unconditioned and the other zones are conditioned, adjacent surfaces somehow get confusion to be part of the energy modeling or not .. however, when I condition the atrium again I get the same error .. 



What are the possible solutions? 



Regards

Amir
